body:
Generalization (from years ago working on Java) -- everything post-dominated by (a) panic(s) is marked as unlikely.

In years past, people have proposed training neural networks to infer branch frequencies from program characteristics -- I recall a presentation by Ben Zorn where he showed how well a by-the-book evaluation worked, doing 20 trials of train-on-19-test-on-remaining-1, with the bonus unethical slide at the end where he does 20 trials of train-on-20 -- which is what all the compiler writers would use, because benchmarks.
